author: n3tsurge (bcarroll@zeroonesecurity.com)
description: ISO/IEC 27001:2022 is an international standard for information security management systems (ISMS). It provides a systematic approach to managing sensitive company information, ensuring its confidentiality, integrity, and availability. The standard outlines requirements for establishing, implementing, maintaining, and continually improving an ISMS.
title: ISO/IEC 27001:2022
